question: Act like a chicken until your next turn.
Act out an infomercial for a product chosen by the other players.
Attempt the first TikTok dance on your FYP.
Attempt to juggle two or three items of the asker's choosing.
Bark like a dog.
Brush your teeth with salt
Burp the alphabet.
Call a friend, pretend it's their birthday, and sing “Happy Birthday” to them.
Call a parent and prank them by saying you've been arrested.
Call a random acquaintance and tell them you want to break up.
Call the first person in your contacts list and sing them “Happy Birthday.”
Call your best friend and pick a fight with them.
Call your crush.
Call your parents and convince them that you are pregnant.
Call your partner and prank them by saying you are pregnant.
Change your relationship status on your social media.
Choose someone from this room to go skinny dipping in a pool.
Choose someone in this room to lick whipped cream from your finger.
Comment a fire emoji on the first five pictures on your Instagram feed.
Crack an egg on our head.
Dance with no music for 1 minute.
Demonstrate a sexual position with a pillow.
Demonstrate how you style your hair in the mirror, without actually using the mirror.
Describe the most attractive quality of every person in the room.
Do 100 squats
Do 5 minutes of stand-up comedy.
Do a cartwheel.
Do a free-style rap for the next minute.
Do a plank for a full minute.
Do an impression of another player until your next turn.
Do karaoke to a song of the group's choosing.
Do your best impression of a fish out of water.
Do your best interpretive dance/gymnastics floor routine.
Do your best sexy crawl
Drink 1 cup of lemon juice.
Dump a bucket of cold water on your head.
Dump out your purse or pockets and do a show and tell of what's inside.
Eat a bite of a banana peel.
Eat a packet of hot sauce straight.
Eat a packet of ketchup straight.
Eat a raw egg.
Eat a snack without using your hands
Eat a spoonful of coffee grounds
Feed someone a food with your mouth.
Find your first crush on social and DM them.
Flash someone
For the rest of the game, no walking is allowed. You can roll, hop on one foot, crawl on all fours, somersault, etc.
Give a foot massage to the person on your right
Give a lap dance to someone of your choice
Give a one-word “roast” to each other player.
Give a shoulder rub to the player to your right (if they are comfortable).
Give another player your phone and let them send a social media DM to anyone they want.
Go outside and do your best wolf howl at the moon.
Go outside and pretend to mow grass with an invisible mower — make mowing sounds too!
Go outside and sing “You are My Sunshine” at full volume.
Grab a broom and do a seductive dance with it.
Keep your eyes closed until it's your turn again
Kiss the person to your left.
Lay on the floor and act like a sizzling piece of bacon.
Lead the group in a mini yoga class for one minute.
Let another person draw a tattoo on you with a permanent marker.
Let another person post a status on your behalf.
Let another player create a hat out of toilet paper and wear it for the rest of the game.
Let another player style your hair and leave it that way for the rest of the game.
Let someone give you a wedgie.
Let someone in the group blindfold you and feed you one item out of the fridge.
Let someone paint your nails any way they want.
Let the group mix together five of whatever liquids they find in the fridge, then drink it.
Let the other players blindfold you and try to guess three food items just by smell.
Let the other players go through your phone for one minute.
Let the other players pose you and remain in that position until your next turn.
Let the person on your right draw on your face.
Let the player to your right redo your makeup.
Lick a bar of soap.
lick the floor and make a video of it.
Like the first 15 posts on your Facebook newsfeed
Make silly faces until someone in the group laughs.
Narrate the game in a newscaster voice for three turns.
Peel a banana using just your toes.
Perform a dance routine to a boy band song of the group's choice.
Perform a dramatic version of a monologue from a favorite TV show or movie.
Perform ballet for 1 minute.
Play air guitar for one minute.
Pole dance with an imaginary pole
Post a photo to social with a heartfelt dedication to a celebrity of the group's choosing.
Post an unflattering selfie to your favorite social media account.
Post the oldest selfie on your phone to Snapchat or Instagram stories (and leave it up!).
Pour ice down your pants.
Prank call one of your family members.
Pretend that you have a pet and play with it.
Pretend to make love to someone invisible.
Pretend to make out with your hand.
Put on a blindfold and guess who each player is by touching their face.
Put on makeup a full face of makeup without looking in the mirror, then leave it like that for the rest of the game.
Put on the worst outfit in your closet, take a selfie and post to social media
Quack like a duck until your next turn.
Read aloud the last five things you searched on your phone.
Read the last text message you sent out loud.
Remove four items of clothing
Remove your socks with your teeth.
Repeat everything the person to your right says until your next turn.
Say something dirty to the person on your left
Seductively eat a banana
Send a sext to the last person in your contact list
Serenade the person to your right for a full minute.
Shave one eyebrow.
Show me the least sexy part of your body.
Show off your best dance moves for the full duration of a song.
Show off your orgasm face
Show the most embarrassing photo on your phone.
Shower with your clothes on.
Sing a song every time you receive a notification on your phone.
Sing instead of speaking any time you talk for three turns.
Sing your partner a lullaby
Smell another player's armpit.
Smell another player's bare foot.
Speak in an Irish accent until your next turn.
Spin around 12 times and try to walk straight.
Stand in the cold shower with your favorite clothes on.
Streak around the block
Swap clothes with someone of the opposite sex for 2 rounds.
Take a body shot
Take a selfie on the toilet and post it.
Talk without closing your mouth.
Touch someone else's tongue with yours.

Try to put your whole fist in your mouth

Video chat the person of your choice while picking your nose through the entire conversation.
Walk next door with a measuring cup and ask for a cup of sugar.
Wear another player's socks like gloves for the next five minutes.
Wear your shoes on the wrong feet for the rest of the game.
Write a naughty story and send it to your crush.
You have 5 minutes to write a country song and perform it.
